                                        throws java.net.URISyntaxException

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • shutdownThreadExecutor

        public static void shutdownThreadExecutor(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor)
        Shuts down the given thread executor in two phases, first by calling shutdown to reject incoming tasks, and then calling shutdownNow, if necessary, to cancel any lingering tasks.
        Parameters:
        executor - Thread executor to shutdown.

      • getResourceVersionsFromJar

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getResourceVersionsFromJar(java.nio.file.Path jarFile,
                                                                                              Settings settings)
                                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the application resource versions from the jar file which are defined in the application settings, or null if resource versions couldn't be found.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - Path to jar file.
        settings - Application settings.
        Returns:
        The application resource versions from the jar file which are defined in the application settings, or null if resource versions couldn't be found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If exception occurs during processing the jar file.

      • createSFTPConnection

        public static SFTPConnection createSFTPConnection(Settings settings)
                                           throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        Builds and returns connection to filer SFTP server. Note that, the supplied session, channel and sftpChannel objects must be disconnected after usage.
        Parameters:
        settings - App Launcher settings.
        Returns:
        SFTP server connection.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - If filer connection cannot be established.

      • pingSFTPConnection

        public static void pingSFTPConnection(Settings settings)
                               throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        Builds and returns connection to filer SFTP server. Note that, the supplied session, channel and sftpChannel objects must be disconnected after usage.
        Parameters:
        settings - App Launcher settings.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - If filer connection cannot be established.

      • pingURL

        public static boolean pingURL(java.lang.String url,
                              int timeout)
        Pings a HTTP URL. This effectively sends a HEAD request and returns true if the response code is in the 200-399 range.
        Parameters:
        url - The HTTP URL to be pinged.
        timeout - The timeout in millis for both the connection timeout and the response read timeout. Note that the total timeout is effectively two times the given timeout.
        Returns:
        true if the given HTTP URL has returned response code 200-399 on a HEAD request within the given timeout, otherwise false.

      • deleteTemporaryFiles

        public static void deleteTemporaryFiles(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                        java.nio.file.Path... keep)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes given file recursively.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to directory where temporary files are kept.
        keep - Files to keep.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If exception occurs during process.

      • containsFile

        public static boolean containsFile(java.nio.file.Path target,
                                   java.nio.file.Path... files)
        Returns true if given target file is contained within the given files array.
        Parameters:
        target - Target file to search for.
        files - Array of files to search the target file.
        Returns:
        True if given target file is contained within the given files array.
